chapters.title: Chapter 4: The Tale of a Doll
chapters.info: Ajimbura, p. 153 (173)—Karede's manservant. He is very protective of his master's honor. He is thin and wiry, and has a habit of killing rats with his knife. White streaks his dark red hair. He is a member of the Kaensada hill tribes, and drinks from a silver mounted cup made from a human skull. He eats just about anything, with the exception of lizards—eating lizard is forbidden by his tribe.
